Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.view.gui.scenes.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Binder
    Brief utility usable to bind Region's or ImageView's different sizes
    CSS
    Brief utility usable to produce various types of JavaFX-CSS fragments and combine them smartly through unwrapping and consequent re-wrapping
    Effects
    Brief Effect factory
    ProportionalFrame
    Brief custom StackPane that scales proportionally inside the stage
    Refiner
    Brief utility class usable to refine in an easy and clean way various Region's aspects ranging from size to style.
    SimpleImageView
    Brief custom ImageView useful to easily load it from a source and constrain its size
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SizeType
    Brief utility Enum that distinguish between a Region's bindable sizes' type
